Setup Movement Processes for SPoCK

Title Constructs simulation objects in a new simulation environment for use in simulation functions
Simulate_Pop_Static()
Simulates a static spatial, sex, and age-structured population (no feedback loop)
bisection_F()
Title Go from TAC to Fishing Mortality using bisection
check_data_dimensions()
Helper function used to check data dimensions to ensure they are correct
do_francis_reweighting()
Run Francis Reweighting
do_jitter()
Run Jitter Analysis
do_likelihood_profile()
Run Likelihood Profile
do_mcmc()
Run MCMC using rtmbstan
do_retrospective()
Functino to run retrospective analyses
do_runs_test()
Runs test function taken from SS3 diags.
fit_model()
Run RTMB model
get_comp_prop()
Gets composition data proportions normalized according to the assessment specifications from RTMB
get_francis_weights()
Computes Francis weights, which is used internally by do_francis_reweighting
get_idx_fits()
Gets index fits results
get_mcmc_ssb_rec()
Derive SSB and Recruitment from MCMC using posterior samples
get_osa()
Function to format comp data and get OSA residuals from afscOSA (uses afscOSA and compresid as backend to get OSA residuals)
get_retrospective_relative_difference()
Derive relative difference from terminal year from a retrospective analysis.
mcmc_diag()
Model diagnostics for MCMC
mcmc_par_names()
Gets parameter names from mcmc object
mlt_rg_sable_data
Sablefish data for multi region (5 area) case study
plot_resids()
Plots OSA residuals from outputs from get_osa. Much of this code is taken from the afscOM package, but with modificaitons to plot features.
run_annual_cycle()
Title Ruin Annual Cycle in Simulation Environment
sgl_rg_ebswp_data
EBS Walleye Pollock data for single region case study
sgl_rg_sable_data
Sablefish data for single region case study
theme_sablefish()
GGPLOT theme for sablefish
three_rg_sable_data
Sablefish data for multi region (3 area) case study
